tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is very good listener and takes care of patients very well. **** ************* and explains ailments and remedy in a most simple way.

My father had a heart-related issue. He had been to hospital. He had a heart checkup. ****** *** **** **** *** ***** Tablets were prescribed. My mother took him to doctor. Frequently once in 3 months, we visit the hospital. Waiting time was not much. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend the doctor to my family or friends. We took medical tests outside and we went. Now he is fine.
